tips.title: What should I do if I have cold?
tips.description: If you have cold, you should take a rest and drink plenty of water.

tips.title: What should I do if I have fever?
tips.description: If you have fever, you should take a rest. Use a wet cloth to cool your body. Do not drink cold water.

tips.title: What should I do if I have headache?
tips.description: If you have headache, try to take a rest and drink plenty of water.

grannysays.saying: If you have headache, try to take a rest and drink plenty of water.
If you have headache, take an aspirin with water
If you have headache, drink Vodka

tips.title: What should I do if I have stomachache?
tips.description: If you have stomachache, try applying heat to your stomach. You can also try taking mustard oil, heat it up and use it to massage your stomach.

tips.title: What should I do to make meat tender without cooker?
tips.description: You can use raw papaya paste to make meat tender. You can also use vinegar or lemon juice.

tips.title: What should I do if I have cough?
tips.description: If you have cough, you should take a rest and drink plenty of water. If you have kerosene, try applying some kerosene to your neck.

tips.title: What should I do balance excess salt in food?
tips.description: If you have added excess salt to your food, you can add some lemon juice or vinegar to balance the taste. Curd also works well.

tips.title: What should I do to increase water intake?
tips.description: You can add some lemon juice or mint leaves to your water to make it more refreshing. You can also add some fruits like orange or apple to your water.

tips.title: What should I do get rid of pests?
tips.description: You can use neem oil to get rid of pests. You can also use garlic or onion paste. You can also use a mixture of water and soap.
